Discussion: Sep 20, 2023

Status & Updates

  • Demo is Done! Run:

cd Global Lake Hydrology Explorer Directory
python -m GLHE.ngrok_demo
start ngrok in ngrok.exe with ngrok start --all to ports 8500 and 500

  • Gotta make it flexible and interactive now is the next step. How to make the Demo good? Fast? Easy? Respond to the goals that I want?

  • I want to make it so that people understand where the data is coming from and how it is used here.
